items.title: Threatening to fire employees is no way to get them on board with AI
items.description: Companies want workers to embrace AI — but a hardline ultimatum will backfire.

items.title: My husband and I are both divorced. Can our ex-spouses claim on our Social Security?
items.description: “I am 55 and my former spouse is 67.”

items.title: Gen X is lagging in retirement saving and planning. Here’s how to catch up.
items.description: A majority of Generation X members didn’t prioritize retirement until age 50 or beyond.

items.title: The dollar is losing the world’s respect — but you’re losing much more
items.description: Charlie Garcia responds to readers concerned about U.S. dollar weakness, purchasing power and China’s challenge.

items.title: The year-end tax moves that can lower your tax bill and make your refund even bigger than Trump promised
items.description: “The numbers could be enormous when you look at the potential opportunities,” one expert says.
